normalized: … that, huh…

supposedly a noble's mansion, constructed in the early1900s.

because of that, nasty rumors started to spread and soselling the house become difficult.
they say that the lastowner vanished and so it became a deserted house.
a western style, two-storied building.

a courtyard surrounded by very tall walls.
the walls have crumbled here and there and the courtyardis completely overrun by weeds.
indeed, it has the eerie atmosphere of a haunted house.
